attributes.action: allow young and sensible children to have more responsible jobs (out of school hours) and for them to be selected by schools for that
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many young children (11+) get frowned upon by adults because of a few vandils upsetting etc. However some children are very well behaved and ought to be given more responsibility to get a head start in life. To see what the real world out of education is like. Many older people had jobs on farms or in shops when they were younger, and they don't break the law much, do they? How many law breaking pensioners are there?
